text: Nobadi is a 2019 Austrian drama film directed by Karl Markovics. It was screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2019 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Heinz Trixner as Robert Senft * Borhanulddin Hassan Zadeh as Adib Ghubar ==References== ==External links== * Category:2019 films Category:2019 drama films Category:Austrian films Category:Austrian drama films Category:German-language films
title: Nobadi
